title: Education Institution Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of education institutions (K–12, higher education, and related organizations).

terms.label: K–12 School
terms.definition: A primary or secondary school serving pre-kindergarten through grade 12 learners.

terms.label: School District
terms.definition: An administrative unit responsible for operating one or more K–12 schools within a defined jurisdiction.

terms.label: College or University
terms.definition: An institution of higher education authorized to grant degrees or equivalent qualifications.

terms.label: Community or Technical College
terms.definition: A two-year or similar institution focused on associate degrees, certificates, or technical education.

terms.label: Adult Education Center
terms.definition: An institution primarily serving adult learners, including continuing education and workforce programs.

terms.label: Training Provider
terms.definition: An organization that delivers structured training or credential programs outside traditional school or university structures.

terms.label: Education Agency
terms.definition: A governmental or quasi-governmental body responsible for education policy, regulation, or funding.

terms.label: Other Education Institution
terms.definition: An institution involved in education that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
